languages.text: Променад оборудован небольшой зоной для отдыха. Бархатная подложка на сиденьях скамеек выглядит мягкой и удобной.
The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.
languages.original_text: Променад оборудован небольшой зоной для отдыха. Бархатная подложка на сиденьях скамеек выглядит мягкой и удобной.

traits.locale_text: The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.
The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.
The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.
The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.
The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.

languages.text: Auf der Promenade gibt es einen kleinen Sitzbereich. Der Samtbezug der Sitzbänke sieht weich und bequem aus, äußerst einladend.
languages.original_text: The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.

traits.locale_text: Auf der Promenade gibt es einen kleinen Sitzbereich. Der Samtbezug der Sitzbänke sieht weich und bequem aus, äußerst einladend.

languages.text: Un espace de repos a été aménagé sur la promenade. Le revêtement en velours de la banquette semble doux et confortable.
languages.original_text: The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.

traits.locale_text: Un espace de repos a été aménagé sur la promenade. Le revêtement en velours de la banquette semble doux et confortable.

languages.text: 这条长廊上有专门的休息区，长凳上的天鹅绒靠垫看起来又软又舒适。
languages.original_text: The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.

traits.locale_text: 这条长廊上有专门的休息区，长凳上的天鹅绒靠垫看起来又软又舒适。

languages.text: El paseo tiene una zona de descanso designada. Los bancos tienen cojines de terciopelo blandos y cómodos.
languages.original_text: The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.

traits.locale_text: El paseo tiene una zona de descanso designada. Los bancos tienen cojines de terciopelo blandos y cómodos.

languages.text: 遊歩道には専用の休憩スペースがある。ベンチのシートにあるベルベットのクッションは、ふかふかで座り心地が良い。
languages.original_text: The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.

traits.locale_text: 遊歩道には専用の休憩スペースがある。ベンチのシートにあるベルベットのクッションは、ふかふかで座り心地が良い。

languages.text: Güvertede bir dinlenme alanı kurulmuş. Bankın kadife minderli oturak kısmı, yumuşak ve rahat görünüyor.
languages.original_text: The promenade has a dedicated rest area. The velvet cushions on the bench seats look soft and comfortable.
